meanings.sent1: The supersensitive child cried at the loud noise.
meanings.sent2: She is supersensitive to criticism and takes it very personally.
meanings.sent3: The supersensitive alarm clock went off at the slightest touch.
meanings.sent4: His supersensitive hearing picked up the faintest sound in the room.
meanings.sent5: The supersensitive skin reacted immediately to the harsh detergent.

meanings.sent1: Being supersensitive, he was upset by the teasing remarks.
meanings.sent2: She is supersensitive and often feels slighted by small comments.
meanings.sent3: The supersensitive cat pouted when its favorite toy was moved.
meanings.sent4: Her supersensitive emotions were like fragile glass, easily shattered.
meanings.sent5: The supersensitive artist took any critique of her work to heart.

meanings.sent1: The supersensitive scientist noticed the tiniest details in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: He is supersensitive to changes in the environment and can predict storms.
meanings.sent3: The supersensitive detective solved the case in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her supersensitive intuition guided her to make the right decision.
meanings.sent5: The supersensitive photographer captured the emotion in every picture.
